author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-6045: Fixed mail binding to extract attachments if disposition is null but fileName is given. Thanks to Christoph Giera for the patch.

author: hdu
msg: fix build for compilers supporting user-defined literals
are already available in gcc 4.7 and clang 3.1 and this results in problems in code
where literal strings are concatenated without any whitespace inbetween.
